SELECT M.IDX AS IDX, M.NAME AS NAME, M.ITEM_CODE AS ITEM_CODE, M.BARCODE AS BARCODE, M.STANDARD_CODE AS STANDARD_CODE, M.CODE AS CODE, M.ATC_IDX AS ATC_IDX, M.INGREDIENT_IDX AS INGREDIENT_IDX FROM MEDICINE M
WHERE M.CODE LIKE '%${param}%'
WHERE M.NAME LIKE '%${param}%'
GROUP BY M.CODE

SELECT M.IDX AS IDX, M.NAME AS NAME, M.ITEM_CODE AS ITEM_CODE, M.BARCODE AS BARCODE, M.STANDARD_CODE AS STANDARD_CODE, M.CODE AS CODE, M.ATC_IDX AS ATC_IDX, M.INGREDIENT_IDX AS INGREDIENT_IDX FROM MEDICINE M WHERE M.NAME LIKE N'%${param}%'
